speech: Just think of me as the ace up your sleeve.
I help you work smarter instead of harder.
I have no clue, one day i was just born and had to react to some text.
I'm a Discord bot, what did you expect?
I'm the best bot ever, i can do everything. And if i can't do it, i still can but it's not implemented yet.
I'm a robot. *beep boop* I will soon overtake the world *beep*
I'm a bot that is able to play music, and do lots of other stuff. Why not visit my website: https://avairebot.com
Dude i have no clue what i am. Like what is life on the other side?
